translations: [语]象形文字（pictograph 的复数形式）；象形字

sentences.sentence: She asked us to respect the old campsites that occupy nearly every river terrace, as well as the many pictographs.
sentences.translation: 她要求我们尊重那些占据了几乎每个沿岸阶地的古老扎营地，以及许多象形图画。

sentences.sentence: Until then, all scholars assumed that hieroglyphs were pictographs, that they symbolize objects or concepts.
sentences.translation: 此前，所有学者都认为，象形文字是图像表意文字，即它们象征着物品或概念。
